text: Afrocanthium siebenlistii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania, found only in the Usambara and Uzungwa Mountains.Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Canthium siebenlistii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. ==References== Category:Vanguerieae Category:Endemic flora of Tanzania Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Afrocanthium siebenlistii
